nodes.text: Larbec was a male Human who served the Alderaanian noble House of Organa during the Cold War between the Republic and the Sith Empire. Holding the rank of private, Larbec worked as a vendor in the market area of House Organa's estate in the Apalis Coast region, where he sold heavy armor. Larbec had brown hair, brown eyes and fair skin. While working, he wore armor with a backpack and carried a blaster pistol.

Larbec appeared in the video game Star Wars: The Old Republic, released by BioWare in 2011, as a Heavy Armor Vendor for Republic players on Alderaan. With the release of Game Update 4.0 on October 20, 2015, he was removed from the game along with the rest of the Heavy Armor Vendors. His position is also marked on a map in Star Wars: The Old Republic Explorer's Guide, a game guide released by Prima Games.
